Previous Next

Our research centers on problems involving zeolites for NOx reduction, catalysis at metal surfaces, catalysis for shale gas, and energy-directed catalysis.

Browse our principal investigator, lab members, publications, photos, resources and available positions to learn more.

For more information on chemical engineering and chemistry at Notre Dame, visit the Department of Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering and the Department of Chemistry & Biochemistry.
